title: Supreme Folk
description: The Supreme Court meets folk music. During the day, the New Main Street Singers handle some of the top, most difficult cases in the land. And at night, they live in one big house and they take off their robes and sing folk songs.
starring: George Menschell, Terry Bohner, Laurie Bohner, Sissy Knox, Sean Halloran, Tony Pollono, Jerald Smithers, Johnny Athenakis, Mike Maryama
creator: Mike LaFontaine
altHero: Laurie Bohner dressed as a judge on the stand
alt1: The New Main Street Singers as Supreme Court judges
alt2: Sissy Knox, a judge, doing needlepoint on the stand
alt3: the band playing instruments in a living room
alt4: Terry and Laurie Bohner playing and singing
